sqlinfo.sqlname: 新增物资退回主表信息
sqlinfo.sql: INSERT INTO jy_storehouse_in ( putin_code, putin_type, putin_user, putin_date, putin_storehouse_code, cancel_user, status, remark, inputuser, crt_date, crt_time ) VALUES ( $S{putin_code}, $S{putin_type}, $N{putin_user}, $S{putin_date}, $S{putin_storehouse_code}, $N{sys_user_id}, $N{status}, $S{remark}, $N{sys_user_id}, $S{SYSDATE}, $S{SYSTIME} );

sqlinfo.sqlname: 新增物资退回明细信息

sqlinfo.sql: UPDATE jy_storehouse_in SET putin_user = $N{putin_user}, putin_date = $S{putin_date}, putin_storehouse_code = $S{putin_storehouse_code}, remark = $S{remark} WHERE id = $N{id};

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询新增物资退回信息的id
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT id FROM jy_storehouse_in WHERE putin_code =$S{putin_code};

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询当前用户的物资退回信息
查询物资退回明细信息通过主表id
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT t2.id jy_material_id, t2.`code` code, t2.`name` name, t2.model, t2.supplier, t3.`code` material_type_code, t3.`name` codename, t1.putin_number FROM jy_storehouse_in_detail t1 LEFT JOIN jy_material t2 ON t1.jy_material_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN jy_material_type t3 ON t2.jy_material_type_id = t3.id WHERE t2.id IS NOT NULL AND t1.jy_storehouse_in_id = $U{id}

sqlinfo.sqlname: 查询物资退回状态通过主表id
sqlinfo.sql: SELECT status FROM jy_storehouse_in WHERE id =$N{id};
